H0.text: It creates a spark when flipping a switch to turn on a light.

H1.text: It breaks an electrical circuit, allowing current to flow and the light to turn on when the switch is flipped.

H2.text: It generates electricity is how flipping a switch turns on a light.

H3.text: It completes an electrical circuit, which is how flipping a switch turns on a light.

A4.text: An electrical circuit is a network consisting of a closed loop, giving a return path for the current.
